title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: Simulation-based Collaboration for Interprofessional Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply medical team collaboration protocols using three media (phone, email, video conferencing) with 85% or higher accuracy.
Learners perform communication strategies that achieve 70% or higher collaboration satisfaction during conflict situations with other professions in role-play simulations.
Learners write reflective journals incorporating at least three of the four core competencies from the Interprofessional Education Collaborative (IPEC).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
